title: The major US tourist cities that are turning to indoor vaccine or testing mandates
content:
1. The major US tourist cities that are turning to indoor vaccine or testing mandates  CNN
  2. Boston mayor lines up vaccine mandates amid pushback from city workers  POLITICO
  3. Mixed reactions to Mayor Michelle Wu's new COVID-19 vaccine requirements for Boston  WCVB Channel 5 Boston
  4. Not just Boston: Here are the other Mass. communities looking to require proof of vaccination for certain indoor venues  Boston.com
  5. Protesters Object To Boston's City Worker Vaccine Mandate, Proof Of Vaccination Policy  CBS Boston
